item.title: Capturing the Mouse
item.description: Problem You want to hide the mouse cursor and keep the mouse from leaving the game window. This is common in many 3D games (and some 2D ones). Solution You can set the mouse state using Input.set_mouse_mode(). There are four possible mouse modes: MOUSE_MODE_VISIBLE: The mouse is visible and can move freely into and out of the window. This is the default state. MOUSE_MODE_HIDDEN: The mouse cursor is invisible, but the mouse can still move outside the window.
